attributes.name: Active Inference Modeling of Collective Behavior
attributes.description: Developing computational models of collective behavior using the Active Inference framework

attributes.name: Ant Colony Decision Making Study
attributes.description: Field study of ant colony decision-making processes in natural environments

attributes.name: Neural Basis of Active Inference
attributes.description: Investigation of neural mechanisms underlying active inference in biological systems

attributes.name: Active Inference

attributes.name: Collective Behavior
attributes.description: Emergent properties and dynamics of group behavior in social organisms

attributes.name: Swarm Intelligence
attributes.description: Collective problem-solving abilities emerging from local interactions

attributes.title: Active Inference Framework for Collective Behavior Analysis
Decision Making Patterns in Ant Colonies: A Field Study
Computational Models of Active Inference in Social Insects

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<graphml xmlns="http://graphml.graphdrawing.org/xmlns"

         xsi:schemaLocation="http://graphml.graphdrawing.org/xmlns
         http://graphml.graphdrawing.org/xmlns/1.0/graphml.xsd">
  <graph id="G" edgedefault="directed">
    <!-- Node attribute keys -->
    <key id="type" for="node" attr.name="type" attr.type="string"/>
    <key id="name" for="node" attr.name="name" attr.type="string"/>
    <key id="role" for="node" attr.name="role" attr.type="string"/>
    <key id="department" for="node" attr.name="department" attr.type="string"/>
    <key id="email" for="node" attr.name="email" attr.type="string"/>
    <key id="publications" for="node" attr.name="publications" attr.type="string"/>
    <key id="expertise" for="node" attr.name="expertise" attr.type="string"/>
    <key id="yearsExperience" for="node" attr.name="yearsExperience" attr.type="string"/>
    <key id="status" for="node" attr.name="status" attr.type="string"/>
    <key id="startDate" for="node" attr.name="startDate" attr.type="string"/>
    <key id="endDate" for="node" attr.name="endDate" attr.type="string"/>
    <key id="funding" for="node" attr.name="funding" attr.type="string"/>
    <key id="fundingSource" for="node" attr.name="fundingSource" attr.type="string"/>
    <key id="description" for="node" attr.name="description" attr.type="string"/>
    <key id="field" for="node" attr.name="field" attr.type="string"/>
    <key id="keyPapers" for="node" attr.name="keyPapers" attr.type="string"/>
    <key id="location" for="node" attr.name="location" attr.type="string"/>
    <key id="cost" for="node" attr.name="cost" attr.type="string"/>
    <key id="purchaseDate" for="node" attr.name="purchaseDate" attr.type="string"/>
    <key id="maintenanceSchedule" for="node" attr.name="maintenanceSchedule" attr.type="string"/>
    <key id="title" for="node" attr.name="title" attr.type="string"/>
    <key id="authors" for="node" attr.name="authors" attr.type="string"/>
    <key id="journal" for="node" attr.name="journal" attr.type="string"/>
    <key id="year" for="node" attr.name="year" attr.type="string"/>
    <key id="doi" for="node" attr.name="doi" attr.type="string"/>
    <key id="citations" for="node" attr.name="citations" attr.type="string"/>
    <!-- Edge attribute keys -->
    <key id="relationship_type" for="edge" attr.name="type" attr.type="string"/>
    <node id="alice">
      <data key="type">researcher</data>
      <data key="name">Dr. Alice Chen</data>

    </node>
    <node id="active-inference-model">

      <data key="name">Active Inference Modeling of Collective Behavior</data>

      <data key="endDate">2025-01-14</data>

    </node>

      <data key="name">Ant Colony Decision Making Study</data>

    </node>
    <node id="neural-basis">

      <data key="fundingSource">NIH</data>
      <data key="description">Investigation of neural mechanisms underlying active inference in biological systems</data>
    </node>
    <node id="active-inference">

      <data key="description">Framework for understanding perception and action based on free energy minimization</data>
      <data key="keyPapers">10.1038/nn.2635,10.1016/j.tics.2009.04.005</data>
    </node>
    <node id="collective-behavior">
      <data key="type">concept</data>
      <data key="name">Collective Behavior</data>
      <data key="field">Biology</data>
      <data key="description">Emergent properties and dynamics of group behavior in social organisms</data>
      <data key="keyPapers">10.1016/j.tree.2018.01.003</data>
    </node>
    <node id="swarm-intelligence">
      <data key="type">concept</data>
      <data key="name">Swarm Intelligence</data>
      <data key="field">Computer Science</data>
      <data key="description">Collective problem-solving abilities emerging from local interactions</data>
      <data key="keyPapers">10.1007/s11721-007-0004-y</data>
    </node>
    <node id="ant-tracking">

      <data key="name">Ant Tracking System</data>
      <data key="status">Operational</data>
      <data key="location">Main Lab</data>

      <data key="purchaseDate">2023-02-15</data>
      <data key="maintenanceSchedule">Monthly</data>
    </node>
    <node id="neural-recording">
      <data key="type">equipment</data>
      <data key="name">Neural Recording Setup</data>
      <data key="status">Operational</data>
      <data key="location">Neuroscience Lab</data>
      <data key="cost">150000</data>
      <data key="purchaseDate">2023-05-01</data>
      <data key="maintenanceSchedule">Weekly</data>
    </node>
    <node id="computation-cluster">
      <data key="type">equipment</data>
      <data key="name">High Performance Computing Cluster</data>
      <data key="status">Operational</data>
      <data key="location">Server Room</data>
      <data key="cost">200000</data>
      <data key="purchaseDate">2022-11-01</data>
      <data key="maintenanceSchedule">Monthly</data>
    </node>
    <node id="paper-2023a">
      <data key="type">publication</data>
      <data key="title">Active Inference Framework for Collective Behavior Analysis</data>
      <data key="authors">alice,carol,david</data>
      <data key="journal">Nature Computational Science</data>
      <data key="year">2023</data>

;; UltraLink Knowledge Interchange Format (KIF) Export
;; Generated: 2025-03-08T22:42:12.702Z

;; Meta-knowledge
(= (creationDate UltraLinkExport) "2025-03-08T22:42:12.702Z")
(= (entityCount UltraLinkExport) 19)
(= (relationshipCount UltraLinkExport) 44)

;; Functions
(deffunction relationshipCount (?x) (length ?kb.relationships))

;; Rules
(defrule entity-attributes-rule
    "A rule to infer additional attributes for entities based on their type"
    (instance ?entity ?type)
    =>
    (if (eq ?type Person)
        then (assert (isAgent ?entity true))))

(forall (?x ?y)
    (=> (and (adapts_to ?x ?y) (> (efficiency-adapts_to ?x ?y) 0.8))
        (well-adapted ?x ?y)))

;; Entities and their attributes
